title: Can't Log In
body:
Today, my brother after having to restart the new client because of a bug, was unable to log in. This happened right after he closed the client and tried to log in.

Since I didn't close my client I kept playing just fine on my pc, but after I closed it, my brother asked me to try to log in to his account using my pc, just to be sure if the problem was in his pc. Result: he couldn't log in, even on my pc.

Since he couldn't log in with his account on my pc, I tried with mine and the same problem happened, and since then I can't log in either, even though it was working just fine a few minutes ago.

I tried almost everything, but still can log in to the client. I would like some help to fix this problem.

PS: My brother ever formatted his pc and installed the client from scratch but still no solution to the problem. {{champion:32}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body: What error is coming up when attempting to login?  Is it a failure to reach the authentication server, or invalid credentials?  Are you logged into the EUW region through the patcher?  Dry those tears, I'm here to help!  I just need some more info.  :P  Let me know!

This is the error that shows up http://imgur.com/PPtLMH9

Doesn't say much. What can I do to give you more info about the error?

Thanks for the screenie, that's good!  You might be having a network problem that's blocking you from reaching the authentication server.  Have you recently done any updates to your OS or anti-virus software?  I suggest grabbing the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and using the auto-configure firewall to make sure it's not blocking you from reaching us. 

In addition, go over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to rule out possibilities.  Hopefully, that will do the trick.
Well, in the meantime, I went to sleep, and now I can log in just fine. I swear I did nothing! Thanks for the help anyways
